url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/Moon

sections.body: This card bears the image of a moonstone gem with the appropriate number of wishes shown as gleams therein; sometimes it depicts a moon with its phase indicating the number of wishes (full = four; gibbous = three; half = two; quarter = one). These wishes are the same as those granted by the 9th-level wizard spell and must be used within a number of minutes equal to the number received.

name: Moon
